teammember.name: Corey Anderson
teammember.title: Former New Zealand Professional Cricketer
teammember.bio: Corey Anderson is a former New Zealand cricketer who played as an all-rounder for New Zealand in International Cricket. He as well as Lahore Qalanders in the PSL, Royal Challengers Bangalore in the IPL and Northern Districts in New Zealand first class cricket.

teammember.name: Ali Khan
teammember.title: American Professional Cricketer
teammember.bio: Ali Khan is an American Cricketer and has played in many other leagues world wide. He played for Trinbago Knight Riders in Carribean Premier League (CPL), Delhi Bulls in Abu Dabhi T10 League, Kolkata Knight Riders in Indian Premier League (IPL)

teammember.name: Ashley Nurse
teammember.title: West Indies Professional Cricketer
teammember.bio: Ashley Nurse is a West Indian Cricketer who plays first class, List A and T20 cricket for Barbados. He is a right arm off spinner and right-hand middle order batsman

teammember.name: Chandrapaul Hemraj
teammember.title: Guyanese Cricketer
teammember.bio: Chandrapaul Hemraj is a Guyanese Cricketer who plays first class and List A for Guyana. He plays for Guyanese Amazon Warriors in Caribbean Premier League (CPL) and Delhi Bulls in Abu Dhabi T10 League

teammember.name: Monank Patel
teammember.title: USA T20 Team Captain
teammember.bio: Monank Patel is an American Cricketer and the Captain of the USA National Cricket Team. In August 2018, he was names in the USA’s squad for the 2018-19 ICC World T20 Americas Qualifier Tournament in Morrisville, North Carolina

teammember.name: Justin Dill
teammember.title: Former South African Professional Cricketer
teammember.bio: Justin Dill was part of South Africa’s squad for the 2014 ICC Under-19 Cricket World Cup. He was the leading wicket-taker for Western Province in the 201819 CSA 3-Day Provincial Cup, with 34 dismissal sin ten matches

teammember.name: Saurabh Netravalkar
teammember.title: USA ODI Team Captain
teammember.bio: Saurabh Netravalkar is an Indian-born American Cricketer who is the current captain of the USA Cricket Team. He is a left-arm medium-fast bowler who has represented India under-19 team. He made his first-class debut for Mumbai in the 2013-14 Raji Trophy on December 22, 2013.

teammember.name: Shehan Jayasuriya
teammember.title: Former Sri Lankan Professional Cricketer
teammember.bio: Shehan Jayasuriya played for Chilaw Marians in Sri Lankan Domestic Cricket. He is a quick-scoring left-handed batsman and a right-arm off-break bowler.

teammember.name: Raymon Reifer
teammember.title: West Indies Professional Cricketer
teammember.bio: Raymon Reifer is a Barbadian Cricketer. He is a left-handed batsman who bowls left-arm medium-fast. He was born in Saint Lucy, Barbados. He made his international debut for the West Indies Cricket Team in December 2017

teammember.name: Rayad Emrit
teammember.title: West Indies Professional Cricketer
teammember.bio: Rayad Emrit is a West Indies cricketer who has represented the West Indies Senior team, making his first ODI appearance just a year after his regional debut in 2007
